titles.title: Rio Grande Wild and Scenic River Extension Act of 2009
To amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to modify the boundary of the Rio Grande Wild and Scenic River.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
committee.name: House Natural Resources

term.name: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary: 1/6/2009--Introduced. Rio Grande Wild and Scenic River Extension Act of 2009 - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to modify the boundary of the Rio Grande Wild and Scenic River.Prohibits anything in this Act from being construed to conflict with specified treaties between the United States and Mexico.
